tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender ENUM('Male', 'Female', 'Other'),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    preference_category VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE customers ( customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, first_name TEXT, last_name TEXT, email TEXT, age INT );
CREATE TABLE preferences ( preference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, customer_id UUID, category TEXT, color TEXT, size TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id) );

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR,
    price DECIMAL,
    category VARCHAR,
    material VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    preference_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    style VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    color VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    size VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
  preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  color VARCHAR(20),
  size VARCHAR(10),
  price_range VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  preferred_category VARCHAR(50),
  suggested_product VARCHAR(100),
  suggestion_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(100),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  color VARCHAR(20),
  size VARCHAR(10),
  price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
  purchase_date DATE,
  quantity INT
)
